job_history.work_description: Responsible for interfacing with leads, project managers, and customer representatives regarding aircraft documentation, parts status, and any problems that may affect the delivery schedule. Also responsible for aircraft paperwork and work cards during the maintenance visits. Worked one on one with purchasing to ensure the proper communication of parts that could affect aircraft delivery and help expedite these parts as necessary.

Responsible for quoting and purchasing materials for both Aircraft and Stock, as well as Stores / Warehouse, Shipping, and Receiving responsibilities. Worked closely with the Executive staff and owners of the company.

Provided daily reports and expedited any material needed to keep the production process flowing efficiently. Coordinated the order and shipment process, as well as the actual delivery of the material.

education.university: State of Florida Department of Education

skills.name: Procurement
skills.explanation: Over a decade of experience in purchasing and procurement, including quoting, purchasing materials, and expediting shipments, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Supply Chain Management
skills.explanation: Extensive experience in coordinating the order and shipment process, as well as managing stores, warehouse, shipping, and receiving responsibilities, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Project Coordination
skills.explanation: Coordinated with project managers, customer representatives, and leads to ensure timely delivery of aircraft, suggesting strong proficiency in project coordination.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Effectively communicated with executive staff, owners, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth operations, indicating strong proficiency in communication.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Provided daily reports and expedited materials to keep production processes flowing efficiently, showing strong proficiency in time management.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Worked closely with executive staff and owners, but no direct leadership experience mentioned, suggesting some practical experience in leadership.

skills.name: Problem-Solving
skills.explanation: Identified and resolved problems that may affect aircraft delivery, showing a solid working proficiency in problem-solving.
